name: HIGHWAY 36/CITY OF BOULDER (F/K/A HIGHWAY 36/CITY OF LOUISVILLE)
sampleDescriptions: Monitor FY2018 and FY2019 Department of Transportation Appropriations Bills. Support increased TIGER Grant funding at the Department of Transportation
Track and monitor FAST Act implementation; Support revisions to FRA rules governing train horns.  Support new definition for Bus Rapid Transit.
